author: eptwts
text:
ultimately what separates boys from men, is not age, "masculinity" or anything of that nature - but having people that depend on them...

name a single man you respect whose main objective isn't taking care of his people - there's NONE 

i don't care who you are, who you know, or what you own - if you carry the weight of responsibility instead of running away from it, you deserve everyones respect
